BattleEffectText.Name: Heehaw’s Hour to Shine
BattleEffectText.Desc: Heehaw's Combat Page will be played on the fourth Speed die. When Staggered, the first Speed die breaks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Woof’s Warmup Performance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Woof's Combat Page will be played on the fourth Speed die. When Staggered, the second Speed die breaks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Doodle-doo’s Cocky Session
BattleEffectText.Desc: Doodle-doo's Combat Page will be played on the fourth Speed die. When Staggered, the third Speed die breaks.

BattleEffectText.Name: Tagged
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts one Scene. If the character with this status wins a clash against a die on a Combat Page while this effect is active, a copy of that page is added to their hand. (Once per page)

BattleEffectText.Name: Universal Vulnerability
BattleEffectText.Desc: All resistances change to "Fatal" for this Scene.
